keyMoments.title: Paulie's Speaking Debut
keyMoments.description: Paulie makes his first speaking appearance, showcasing his rope techniques as he retrieves stolen money while being chased by debt collectors. He demonstrates his skills as a Dock #1 foreman.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Paulie as a skilled shipwright and future ally, introducing his rope-based fighting style and debt problems.
keyMoments.quote: Hey! Cover yourself up, woman! That's indecent!

keyMoments.title: Explaining the Keel's Importance
keyMoments.description: Paulie explains to the Straw Hats why the Going Merry's keel damage is irreparable, describing the keel as the ship's lifeline and explaining that replacing it would require building an entirely new ship.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial technical explanation that helps the crew understand the finality of the Going Merry's condition.
keyMoments.quote: The keel is the lifeline of the ship. Ships are built starting with the keel. Replacing the keel would mean building a new ship.

abilities.description: Paulie uses intricate rope techniques for combat and utility, carrying hundreds of meters of rope concealed in his sleeves. He can perform acrobatics combined with rigging techniques.

relationships.description: Paulie works as a foreman under Iceburg at Galley-La Company and has great respect for him.

evolutionMoments.description: Paulie is shown as one of Iceburg's trusted foremen at Dock #1.

relationships.description: Paulie works alongside Rob Lucci as a fellow foreman at Dock #1.

evolutionMoments.description: Lucci brings Paulie back to Dock #1, with Hattori scolding him about his debts.

reveals.information: Dock One Foreman at Galley-La Company, specializing in rigging, knots, and masts
Uses Rope Action fighting techniques with hundreds of meters of concealed rope
Extremely prudish about women's clothing, chronic gambling debts

keyMoments.title: Delivering the Going Merry's Diagnosis
keyMoments.description: Kaku returns from inspecting the Going Merry and delivers the devastating news that the ship's keel is irreparably damaged and cannot be fixed, even with Galley-La's expertise. It's a miracle the ship even reached Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: This diagnosis is the catalyst for the entire Water 7 arc conflict, leading to Luffy's difficult decision and Usopp's departure from the crew.
keyMoments.quote: Merry's scars from battles are too deep. That ship is beyond repair. It's a miracle you even reached Water 7.

abilities.description: Kaku is highly proficient in ship diagnostics and mechanics, able to quickly assess structural damage and determine repairability.

relationships.description: Kaku works as a foreman under Iceburg at Galley-La Company (as part of his CP9 cover).

evolutionMoments.description: Kaku is trusted to inspect the Straw Hats' ship, showing Iceburg's confidence in his abilities.

reveals.information: Expert ship diagnostician capable of detailed structural assessments

keyMoments.title: Guiding the Tour of Dock #1
keyMoments.description: Kalifa professionally guides Luffy, Nami, and Usopp through Galley-La Company's Dock #1, explaining the company's history, operations, and Iceburg's role as founder and president.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kalifa's role as Iceburg's secretary and her professional demeanor, hiding her true identity as a CP9 agent.
keyMoments.quote: This is Galley-La Company, the finest shipbuilding company in all of Water 7.

relationships.description: Kalifa serves as Iceburg's personal secretary at Galley-La Company (as part of her CP9 cover).

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa represents Iceburg by giving the official tour to potential clients.

reveals.information: Secretary to Iceburg, mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company

keyMoments.title: Iceburg's Dual Role Established
keyMoments.description: Iceburg's position as both mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company is explained, showing his importance to the city's economy and politics.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes why Iceburg is such an important figure and why CP9 targets him.

keyMoments.title: Declining Luffy's Recruitment
keyMoments.description: Iceburg politely declines Luffy's impulsive offer to join the Straw Hat Pirates, explaining he has responsibilities to Water 7 and his company.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Iceburg's commitment to Water 7 and establishes he won't be the shipwright the crew is looking for.

keyMoments.title: Warning About the Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Iceburg warns the Straw Hats about the dangerous Franky Family, describing them as ship dismantlers and bounty hunters who cause chaos in Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the upcoming conflict and introduces Franky by reputation before his actual appearance.
keyMoments.quote: Be careful of the Franky Family. They're ship dismantlers and bounty hunters who cause chaos in Water 7. Don't underestimate Franky himself.

relationships.description: Kalifa serves as Iceburg's personal secretary.

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa acts on Iceburg's behalf to give the Straw Hats a tour.

relationships.description: Paulie works as one of Iceburg's trusted foremen at Galley-La.

evolutionMoments.description: Paulie works under Iceburg's leadership at Dock #1.

reveals.information: Mayor of Water 7 and President of Galley-La Company
Founded Galley-La Company and transformed Water 7 into a major shipbuilding center

keyMoments.title: Rob Lucci and Hattori's Interaction
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci brings Paulie back to Dock #1 while Hattori appears to scold Paulie about his debts. Lucci maintains his cover as a ventriloquist who never speaks directly, only through his pigeon.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lucci's undercover persona and his unique communication method, hiding his true cold nature as a CP9 assassin.

abilities.description: Lucci speaks through his pet pigeon Hattori, maintaining his cover by appearing to express emotions through the bird while remaining silent himself.

relationships.description: Hattori is Lucci's pet pigeon and constant companion, used as his ventriloquist dummy.

evolutionMoments.description: Lucci uses Hattori to scold Paulie about his debts.

relationships.description: Lucci works alongside Paulie as a fellow foreman at Dock #1.

evolutionMoments.description: Lucci brings Paulie back after he retrieves stolen money.

reveals.information: Appears as a silent ventriloquist who speaks only through his pigeon Hattori

keyMoments.title: Mugged by the Franky Family
keyMoments.description: While distracted watching craftsmanship at the dock, Usopp is ambushed and beaten by the Franky Family, who steal the 200 million berries intended for the Going Merry's repairs.
keyMoments.significance: This attack triggers Usopp's guilt and self-doubt, leading directly to his conflict with Luffy and temporary departure from the crew. One of the most important moments in Usopp's character arc.
